evidence.claim: Aramark Healthcare supports HIPAA compliance in their technology frameworks.
The company employs Azure for their cloud infrastructure.
They utilize HL7 standards for health data interoperability.
Aramark integrates EHR systems for seamless patient data management.
X12 transaction sets are part of their operational processes.

icp.icp_reason: Limited evidence of X12 or EDI capabilities or usage cases on public pages.
